snippet: Ray Lewis said he wanted to “appreciate the ride” in his final home game with the Ravens, and Baltimore fans and players shared his emotions.
abstract: Baltimore Ravens linebacker Ray Lewis ends his illustrious 17-year career by contributing to staunch defensive performance that helped Baltimore to a 24-9 victory against the Indianapolis Colts in his final home game; says he wanted 'to appreciate the ride' and Baltimore fans and players shared his emotions.
lead_paragraph: Ray Lewis said he wanted to “appreciate the ride” in his final home game with the Ravens, and Baltimore fans and players shared his emotions.

headline.seo: Poignant Day for Ray Lewis, the Face of a Franchise
headline.main: Poignant Day for the Face of a Franchise
headline.print_headline: Poignant Day for the Face of a Franchise
